title: The Best Tech Under $500! - July 2017
description: Awesome Tech + Gadgets Under $500. Enjoy!  Check out the Beautyrest Sleeptracker!  My Ultimate 4K TV Setup!   Full Love on the Brain Cover + Aston Spirit Mic test:  Beautyrest Sleeptracker or $250 Amazon Gift Card giveaway:  More lego awesomeness:  Ash Tailor Ultrawide Demo!   ASUS MX299Q Ultrawide Monitor -  Vinta S-Series Camera Backpack -  Apogee One USB Interface -  Aston Microphones Spirit Microphone -   My Audio Setup & Gear:   Add me on Snapchat!  My Gear:  Instagram:  Twitter:

Beyond that, because there is a dedicated processor, it is constantly adapting and getting smarter over time.
